 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנַד‎</span>] **verb** ==bind around, upon== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***turn aside*** from way; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***defecit, defuit***; compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמָּדִי‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמִּי‎</span>)); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִי אֶעֶנְרֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Job.31.36|Job 31:36]] (object garland, in figure); ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנְדֵם‎</span> [[Prov.6.21|Prov 6:21]] (figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשַׁר‎</span>).
